DOC.brief_summary: The aim current study evaluate effectiveness sperm selection use fertile chip unexplained infertile couple intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Using Fertile Chip Sperm Selection Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: The aim current study evaluate effectiveness sperm selection use fertile chip unexplained infertile couple intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle . On study arm sperm selection perform use special microchannel system call fertile chip ( FC ) without use sperm wash procedure . This FC system lead select lineer motile progressive sperm selection . In control group , sperm selection perform classical way sperm undertaken sperm wash gradient method . After selection sperm arm , ICSI perform . The outcome ICSI schedule assesed fertilization clinical pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: 2037 yearold woman normal tubal patency , normal uterine cavity , normal ovulation , 2040 yearold men normal semen analyse WHO criterias unexplained infertile couple poor ovarian reserve diagnose Bologna criterias abnormal semen analyse WHO sperm criterias abnormal ovulation problem , tubal patency uterine cavity
